messages.content:
Hello , 

Due to unforeseen demand , we are not able to address each request so we have decided to digitised all lakes around hyderabad and make it accessible for free for everyone.

To help prioritise the digitisation process, fill the following form with your requirements. We will inform you once your required lake is digitised. 
Requirement form : https://forms.gle/LFThdXChRzH8Uz6M6 

Thanks for your patience.

messages.content: Hello Mr Mahmood. We can help people with publicly available data on Lakes. Have to check if the info is available publicly for Musi river. But if the authorities identified that your land is in buffer zone, don't think there is much we can do.

Hi, this is Mahmood.

I have a concern regarding the buffer zone. My home is located near the Musi River in Kishan Bagh, Mahmood Nagar, Hyderabad. I have lived here for the past 15 years and recently learned that my house falls within the buffer zone. I am unsure of the implications.

Can you please tell me what will happen to my house? Is it permissible to continue living here?
